circumstances: On approach to Alief-Andrau Airpark in low ceiling (400-600 feet), one of the engine failed. Due to insufficient speed, the airplane stalled and crashed. A pilot was killed while two other occupants were seriously injured.
probable_cause:
Engine malfunction on approach for undetermined reasons. The following contributing factors were reported:
- Failed to maintain flying speed, 
- Low ceiling, 
- Complete engine failure one engine, 
- Visibility one mile or less, 
- Weather at airport near Andrau 400 to 600 feet.
